title: The Pet Guru - Free From Fleas Household Flea Spray - Natural Fast Acting Household Flea Spray - Home Flea Control - Dogs and Cats, 500ml- Flea Spray For Furniture - Flea Spray For House
features: PROTECTION FOR THE HOME: This easy to use all-natural spray will keep all corners of your home pest-free. It’s tough on fleas, but tender on your loved ones and the environment.

NATURAL TINCTURE REMEDIES to protect your pet and your household. Each product contains a blend of expertly researched powerful and fast-acting pet and child-friendly herb and plant extracts and premium essential oils, chosen only for their efficiency and used in the minimum quantity necessary to perform. No excess for excess sake.
ACTIVE INGREDIENTS THAT REALLY WORK: Catnip & Lemongrass repel | Rosemary & Lavender deter | Quassia bark is anti-inflammatory & anti-parasitic
STAIN FREE FAST ACTING NATURAL EFFECTIVE FORMULA: Kind to dog bedding & toys, carpets, rugs and upholstery, leaving a calming scent of lemongrass and French lavender.

RECYCLABLE PACKAGING: Black plastic bottle with trigger spray. The bottle uses a uniquely dyed plastic that is detectable in recycling scanners (unlike the majority of black plastic vessels which are undetectable in scanners and so end up in landfill).

MANUFACTURED IN UK: Designed, developed and manufactured in Suffolk by two dog loving families with a shared love for caring for the planet. “We believe our children, as well as our pets, are a product of their environment. The happier and healthier the environment, the happier and healthier they will grow.”
description: Product Description Previous page Fast-acting Free From Fleas Powerful, yet effective flea prevention using natural plant and herb extracts . Natural Protection Flea Life Cycle How to keep your home and pet flea-free. Gentle, but effective All around care Products designed to naturally tackle specific health issues. Click to play video Play Mute Current Time  0:00 / Duration  0:19 Loaded : 31.61% 0:00 Stream Type  LIVE Seek to live, currently behind live LIVE Remaining Time  - 0:19   1x Playback Rate Chapters Chapters Descriptions descriptions off , selected Captions captions off , selected English (Automated) Audio Track default , selected Fullscreen This is a modal window. hero-video Merchant video Active Ingredients Benefits Catnip A natural insect repellent which triggers a chemical pain response in fleas. Quassia bark An effective hair parasite treatment - antiparasitic and anti-inflammatory. Lemongrass essential oil A natural insect repellent - safe around both dogs and cats. Rosemary An excellent flea, mite and tick deterrent. Lavender essential oil Calming for pets and off-putting for insects Aren’t some essential oils like lemongrass poisonous to cats, yet you use lemongrass in this spray? Yes, it is poisonous if ingested in large quantities, but our product is non-toxic and safe when used as a spray because we only use a tiny amount – just enough to deter fleas. Lemongrass is commonly used in many other natural flea sprays & products. Can I use this spray on all materials? The spray is safe to use on any materials that will not stain when dampened – carpets, dog beds, blankets, cushions, toys etc. It can be used both as a flea deterrent or simply just to freshen. Do we need to vacate the property for a time period after using the spray? There is no need to leave the property, but we would suggest keeping the room/surfaces clear of pets for 10-15 minutes to allow the spray time to settle and dry out slightly and to avoid any transference of damp spray to their paws or coat.
